thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Roger Lane
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Roger Lane

author: Roger Lane
title: Roger Lane
text: We rented a Toyota Corolla for 7 days, picking it up in Queenstown and dropping it off in Christchurch. The company picked us up at the airport and took us to their office about 2 minutes away from the airport. The paperwork was done quickly and the car was clean and had a full tank of petrol. I was really pleased with the car, it was well equipped, comfy and the engine was pokey for a small/medium car and this was very welcome when tackling the local terrain. The drop off at Christchurch was also efficient, followed by a short shuttle bas ride to the terminal. For the price and quality of car I would definitely use Omega again.
